content.prompt: The rhetorical purpose of Paragraph 1 ("And we ... values") is to

choices.label: assert that the contemporary view of Franklin distorts his accomplishments
suggest that Franklin did not balance his pursuits particularly well
make Franklin seem more morally upright than he may actually have been
prompt the reader to feel kinship with Franklin on the basis of the challenges he faced

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
